issue.title: [CF 120] Wish: add condition "item equipped"
issue.body:
I'm showing certain item cooldowns (e.g. trinkets) with TMW. Those icons are shown if the trinket can be used (mana reg). It would be nice if I could attach a condition to the item that enables the item only if a certain item is equipped -- not necessarily the one the item's name refers to though.

What version of TellMeWhen are you using? ("The latest" is not a version)
3.0.4a


> Posted by CurseForge user mosu | Imported from CurseForge issue #120 | Raw
